name: Insectoid Descent
description:
Mysterious Lore


Genetically modified insectoids are the product of an isolated top-secret research base. As a consequence of experimentation, a mutation enabled the bugs to break captivity. They began replicating exponentially and have annihilated the facility. Your team has been dispatched to prepare the site for cleanup, an extermination.

Sandbox Mode


You can play the game while spawning in explosive barrels, more enemies, teleporting around and regenerating your health.

Detailed World

    -Destructable Walls
    -Hazardous Machinery
    -Climb Fences
    -Door Crushing
    -Red Explosive Barrels
    -More to discover
